alert.note: Alert for Phillips (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 11 at 6:46PM CDT until June 11 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Phillips County in eastern Arkansas... Northeastern Coahoma County in northwestern Mississippi... Southwestern Tunica County in northwestern Mississippi... Northwestern Quitman County in northwestern Mississippi... * Until 730 PM CDT. * At 645 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Watkins Corner, or near Marvell, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Marvell, Helena-West Helena, St Francis National Park, Friars Point, Lexa, Dubbs, Dundee, Watkins Corner, Lake View, Coahoma, Lula, Gerlach Mill, Wabash, Moon, Preston Place, Quarles, Westover, Jeffries, Wycamp and Latour. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
